p: A 0.1 g oil sample was 10 times diluted using petroleum ether in centrifuge tubes (15 mL), and the absorbance was measured immediately at 450 nm using a UV-1800—Visible Spectrophotometer SHIMADZU (Shimadzu Corp., Kyoto, Japan). Results were expressed as mg β-carotene equivalent per mL −1 (mg mL −1).
